name: recipe-clipper-for-notion
description: CLI tool that scrapes recipe URLs, generates AI scores/tags with Claude, and saves to Notion

scripts.build:extension: cp -r src/shared extension/shared && tsc -p extension/tsconfig.json && bunx tailwindcss -i extension/input.css -o extension/styles.css --minify
scripts.build:web: cp -r src/shared public/shared && tsc -p public/tsconfig.json && bunx tailwindcss -i public/input.css -o public/web.css --minify
